mapper.select: SELECT d.doc_id, d.doc_no, d.doc_type, d.memo, d.reg_dtime, o.order_id, o.order_no, o.order_status, c.cart_id, c.total_qty, c.total_price, c.fuel_id, f.fuel_nm u.user_name FROM TB_DOCUMENT_MST d LEFT JOIN TB_ORDER_MST o ON d.order_id = o.order_id LEFT JOIN TB_CART c ON o.cart_id = c.cart_id LEFT JOIN TB_OIL_MST f ON c.fuel_id = f.fuel_id LEFT JOIN TB_USERS u ON d.owner_user_id = u.user_name WHERE o.doc_id = #{docId} ORDER BY d.doc_id DESC;
SELECT d.doc_id, d.doc_no, d.doc_type, d.memo, d.reg_dtime, u.user_name FROM TB_DOCUMENT_MST d LEFT JOIN TB_USERS u ON d.owner_user_id = u.user_no ORDER BY d.doc_id DESC
